Articles.Content:
Sorry for my english.
So, i have launched spacecraft on the Mun's pole,collected lots of data, but ran out of fuel.
Its on high orbit of Kerbin.
I've launched satellite to save this ship, but i can't do it myself.
Manned spacecraft named as "Восход-2".
Save this ship and point to to orbit with Pericenter under 70 km, then save the game, please.
Thanks.
https://drive.google.com/open?id=19d3WVPdgnxQO3ZXUPtaJ_eQkfq58D6xn - sfs file.
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1JVi0HcUCZoe4MD4GgrhqHvJFqiM1VHIL - loadmeta file.

P.S.:I have parts from mods on my craft, should i say from what mods?
P.P.S.: Mods: kOS,KIS,DMagicOrbitalScience,TarsierSpaceTech,Copernicus,Kerbetotterltd(rover mod),community category kit and community resource pack, texture replacer, modular flight integrator(what is that?), planetary base inc, realistic atmospheres, SCANsat.
 

Edited October 31, 2018 by lalacka

27 minutes ago, lalacka said:

P.S.:I have parts from mods on my craft, should﻿ i say from what mods?

Definitely. Otherwise the saves won't load.

3 hours ago, lalacka said:

Sorry for my english.
So, i have launched spacecraft on the Mun's pole,collected lots of data, but ran out of fuel.
Its on high orbit of Kerbin.
I've launched satellite to save this ship, but i can't do it myself.
Manned spacecraft named as "Восход-2".
Save this ship and point to to orbit with Pericenter under 70 km, then save the game, please.
Thanks.
https://drive.google.com/open?id=19d3WVPdgnxQO3ZXUPtaJ_eQkfq58D6xn - sfs file.
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1JVi0HcUCZoe4MD4GgrhqHvJFqiM1VHIL - loadmeta file.

P.S.:I have parts from mods on my craft, should i say from what mods?
P.P.S.: Mods: kOS,KIS,DMagicOrbitalScience,TarsierSpaceTech,Copernicus,Kerbetotterltd(rover mod),community category kit and community resource pack, texture replacer, modular flight integrator(what is that?), planetary base inc, realistic atmospheres, SCANsat.
 

I think you should post this in Gameplay Questions and Tutorials, oh and before I go, welcome to the KSP forums!

2 hours ago, The_Cat_In_Space said:

I think you should post this in Gameplay Questions and Tutorials, oh and before I go, welcome to the KSP forums!

This subforum is for greeting newbies, but also a place where they can ask questions before they're confident enough to venture out into the main forum.

That being said, lalacka, I would advise you to retain your save at this point and just keep trying the mission until you rescue the ship yourself. If it doesn't go well, just re-load the save. It would be good practice. 

And welcome to the forum, and your English is fine.

Welcome to the forum

Well, if you cannot manage to send a rescue ship, you still have 3 options:

1) Get a Kerbal on EVA and push the ship retrograde while close at the Ap (yes that's actually possible )
2) Use the 'infinite fuel' cheat from the debug menu (open the menu with alt + F12 or ctrl + alt + F12 or hit 'ESC' and click on 'Click for Version Info...')
3) Use this savefile: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2yh2mh2ifnvcsgn/persistent.sfs?dl=0 (I've edited the trajectory so your Pe is now at ~50km)

Thank you all guys for help, especially @4x4cheesecake for his save file.
From now on i'll be carefully with building rockets:D

Edited November 1, 2018 by Val
Use @ to link a user
